Text: Change the height limit of the map. This setting and all others need a restart to take effect.
The height limit of the terrain. Note: count from 0 (Game default: 22)
The height limit above the terrain limit, i.e., how high you can build (Game default: 10)
[Map Editor] Allow editor brush up to terrain limit
Allow the editor brush to go up to the terrain limit instead of minus 6 (Game default: 22 - 6 = 16)
Enable free camera mode, useful when you have built too high.
